synopsis: Izumi and Mitsuki have run away from the cafe and are looking for work. They notice a sign indicating jobs as maids, but Izumi takes an understandable disliking to Yoshitaka and the girls leave - but they don't get far.

Yoshitaka convinces the girls to come back inside, then hands them the bill for all the things Pochi and Izumi broke the previous day. Between needing to pay off their debt and needing a place to stay, the girls end up employed by Yoshitaka.

title.jp: The Lolicon Uniform Fetishist who loves peeping pictures and plays girl simulation games

synopsis: Izumi and Mitsuki enter Yoshitaka's school, where they meet Anna.

title.jp: Couples formed under extraordinary circumstances don't last long you know

synopsis: Mitsuki's fan club kidnaps her, taking over the mansion. Izumi and Yoshitaka (as well as Anna and Pochi) must work together to save her.

title.jp: There's a rumour that this boy in his midst of puberty who inherited his parents' fortune is...

synopsis: Izumi and Mitsuki's parents pay a visit, to get the girls back. A contest is made to see who gets Izumi!

title.jp: The Sawatari Izumi contest series!! A daring test of courage!! An express train to a secret...

synopsis: Yoshitaka takes the maids to the Summer Festival, but Mitsuki disappears, and it seems the ghost of Yoshitaka's father is involved.
After a series of weird events, Izumi gets the chance of a lifetime to become an idol, will she take the opportunity?
Karin visits Izumi and convinces her to become an idol.

title.jp: Although Izumi is Izumi, Izumi won't yield to anyone

synopsis: The gang go to the beach for Izumi's photoshoot where they meet Alicia and Ellen
Seichirou and Yoshitaka compete to have Izumi and Mitsuki as their maids but there seems to be something suspicious about Seichirou.
Takami challenges Izumi to a contest.
The final showdown between Takami and Izumi!
